# Security Policy

## Reporting a vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it responsibly by emailing [help@eventua11y.com](mailto:help@eventua11y.com). Do not open a public issue.

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and aim to provide a fix or mitigation as quickly as possible.

## Scope

This policy covers the code in this repository and the website at [eventua11y.com](https://eventua11y.com). It does not cover third-party services such as Sanity, Netlify, or Sentry.
